detectors.description:
SafeMath.sub(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MillenniumGoldCoin.sol#21-24) has assert violation
	Assert violations:
	- assert(bool)(b <= a) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MillenniumGoldCoin.sol#22)

StandardToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MillenniumGoldCoin.sol#152-165) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[_from] = balances[_from].sub(_value) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MillenniumGoldCoin.sol#160)
detectors.markdown:
[StandardToken.transferFrom(address,address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MillenniumGoldCoin.sol#L152-L165) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- [balances[_from] = balances[_from].sub(_value)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MillenniumGoldCoin.sol#L160)

detectors.description:
StandardToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MillenniumGoldCoin.sol#141-217) inherits the contract, there is a conflict between state variables and functions
	Conflicting functions and state variables:
	- ERC20Basic.totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MillenniumGoldCoin.sol#81)
	- ERC20Basic.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MillenniumGoldCoin.sol#82)
	- BasicToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MillenniumGoldCoin.sol#102-110)
	- BasicToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MillenniumGoldCoin.sol#117-119)
	- ERC20Basic.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MillenniumGoldCoin.sol#83)

[StandardToken](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MillenniumGoldCoin.sol#L141-L217) inherits the contract, there is a conflict between state variables and functions

detectors.description: Parameter BasicToken.transfer(address,uint256)._to (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MillenniumGoldCoin.sol#102) is not in mixedCase
Parameter BasicToken.balanceOf(address)._owner (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MillenniumGoldCoin.sol#117) is not in mixedCase
Contract tokenRecipient (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MillenniumGoldCoin.sol#220-222) is not in CapWords
Constant MillenniumGoldCoin.initialSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MillenniumGoldCoin.sol#230) is not in UPPER_CASE_WITH_UNDERSCORES

MillenniumGoldCoin.smartfastConstructorConstantVariables() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MillenniumGoldCoin.sol#224-255) uses literals with too many digits:
	- initialSupply = 1000000000 * (10 ** uint256(decimals)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MillenniumGoldCoin.sol#230)

detectors.description:
transferOwnership(address) should be declared external:
	- Ownable.transferOwnership(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MillenniumGoldCoin.sol#68-72)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- BasicToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MillenniumGoldCoin.sol#117-119)
	- ERC20Basic.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MillenniumGoldCoin.sol#82)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- BasicToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MillenniumGoldCoin.sol#102-110)
	- ERC20Basic.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MillenniumGoldCoin.sol#83)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- StandardToken.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MillenniumGoldCoin.sol#189-191)
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MillenniumGoldCoin.sol#127)
